entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned in a dream sequence.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A person who is talking to Voldemort in Harry's dream.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, mentioned as being chosen as school champion.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: A magical painting that guards a secret passage in Hogwarts.

entities.name: violet
entities.description: A witch who has told the Fat Lady about Harry being chosen as school champion.

relationships.description: Harry is interacting with the Fat Lady, who is looking at him with interest.
Voldemort and Wormtail are talking to each other in Harry's dream.
